title: Induced gravity and cosmological principle
authors: V. A. Berezin, I. D. Ivanova, A. E. Kuprina
abstract:
The phenomenological description of the cosmological particle production in
the framework of the induced gravity is investigated. It appears that the
source terms with the particle number density in the creation law can be
interpreted as the invisible part of the Universe. It is shown that there is a
gauge that restores the General Relativity in which our model is equivalent to
the $f(R)$-gravity for $f \propto R^{\frac{3}{2}}$
